alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:18PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Showers and Thunderstorms in Sweetwater County... This is a special weather statement from the national weather service office in Riverton. * WHAT...Thunderstorms and showers will be capable of producing strong wind gusts from 45 to 55 mph. Brief heavy rain and small hail may occur with stronger storms. * WHERE...Sweetwater County, mainly from Green River to the Carbon County line. Flaming Gorge Reservoir is also included, as well as Interstate 80. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Seek safe shelter indoors if storms approach your location. Lightning can strike a few miles away from the main thunderstorm cell.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
